Shower-MDX

Shower presentation generator with support of MDX syntax, powered by Next.js

Shower-MDX template

Shower Presentation Template is built by Vadim Makeev.

What is it?

This is a project template which lets you create your beautiful Shower presentations with markdown syntax and custom React components.

The following slides demonstrate rendered HTML. Check index.mdx to see how it looks in markdown.

Project repository

Feedback and contributions are warmly welcomed!

Shower key features

  1. Built on HTML, CSS and JavaScript
  2. Works in all modern browsers
  3. Themes are separated from engine
  4. Fully keyboard accessible
  5. Printable to PDF

Shower ['ʃəuə] noun. A person or thing that shows.

Serious citations

Code samples 1: simple code block with markdown syntax

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head> <!--Comment-->
    <title>Shower</title>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="screen.css">
</head>

Code samples 2: Code component and custom jsx to highlight lines of code
